hero_title: Earth's Call: Towards a Cleaner World Through Recycling
hero_text: A nonprofit initiative committed to protecting our planet by promoting recycling and environmental awareness in our communities.
mission_highlight_title: Our Mission: Protecting Earth for Future Generations
mission_highlight_text: We work to empower communities through education and resources to reduce waste and promote effective recycling.
card1_text: We work to reduce waste in landfills through community recycling programs and environmental education.
card2_text: Join our team of volunteers and help organize clean-up events and recycling workshops.
card3_text: We have helped divert over 500 tons of waste from landfills and provided environmental education.
step1_text: We collect recyclable materials from homes and businesses.
step2_text: We meticulously sort materials to ensure quality recycling.
step3_text: We process materials to prepare them for transformation into new products.
step4_text: We convert recycled materials into new and useful products.
cta_text: Help us expand our impact and support more sustainable communities.
news1_title: New Recycling Project in the City
news1_summary: Launch of a comprehensive recycling program in five new residential areas.
news2_summary: Join our annual event to clean beaches and protect marine life.
about_subtitle: Since 1995, working for a more sustainable future for Earth
story_para1: Earth's Call initiative was founded in 1995 as an urgent response to the growing impacts of climate change and environmental pollution in our region. We started as a small group of passionate environmental activists.
story_para2: Over the years, we have evolved into a leading organization in environmental awareness and recycling, with a special focus on empowering local communities and providing practical solutions.
story_para3: Today, we are proud to have reached over 50 local communities and provided awareness programs to more than 10,000 people, contributing to the protection of our environment for future generations.
mission_text: To empower communities through education and resources to reduce waste, promote effective recycling, and protect biodiversity in our region.
vision_text: Sustainable communities living in harmony with nature, where recycling is a lifestyle and waste is a valuable resource rather than an environmental burden.
value1_text: We believe that real change starts from the community itself, so we always work as partners with local communities.
value2_text: We are committed to the highest standards of transparency in all our operations and use of donated resources.
value3_text: We strive to include all segments of society in our efforts, with special attention to empowering youth and women.
value4_text: We are always searching for innovative and sustainable solutions to the environmental challenges facing our communities.
team_description: Our team combines experience and passion for environmental protection, with diverse backgrounds in environmental science, engineering, education, and community development.
team1_bio: Ph.D. in Environmental Sciences with over 15 years of experience leading environmental initiatives and policy advocacy.
team2_bio: Environmental engineer specializing in waste management, leading community recycling projects for 8 years.
team3_bio: Specialist in environmental education, designing and implementing awareness programs for schools and local communities.
team4_bio: Manages a network of over 500 volunteers, organizing cleanup events and training workshops.
partners_description: We work hand in hand with local and international institutions to achieve our shared environmental goals.
contact_text: Want to join our efforts or have an idea for a joint project? We love hearing from the community.
